caption.center: PEOPLES STATE BANK, Appellant v. DEMIE MILAYNE RAFFAELLI AND THOMAS

court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Sixth District, Texarkana.

opinion.posture: On Appeal from the 202nd Judicial District Court, Bowie County, Texas, Trial Court No. 07-D-1466-202.
opinion.panel:
Before MORRISS, C.J., CARTER and MOSELEY, JJ.
Memorandum Opinion by Chief Justice MORRISS.
opinion.opinion_byline: JOSH R. MORRISS, III, Chief Justice.
opinion.opinion_text:
Peoples State Bank, the appellant in this case, has filed a motion to dismiss its interlocutory appeal as moot. Pursuant to Rule 42.1 of the Texas Rules of Appellate Procedure, the motion is granted. See Tex. R. App. P. 42.1.
We dismiss the appeal.
